HTML:
Location: We are flexible! Come and join us either in Hamburg, Berlin, Athens or Barcelona.

The Marketplace department is the core of our platform and consists of Product Management, Data and Engineering. Together as a team we are going to build our Pricing product, which leads to higher customer engagement, better supply utilisation, and ultimately to a balanced demand and supply situation.

As the Machine Learning Engineering Lead in the Marketplace, you will work closely with the Product and Engineering Managers to improve the existing products such as surge or demand prediction, and evaluate future opportunities to improve our Marketplace performance. You're responsible for a team of 4 to 6 Machine Learning Engineers, being-hands on in mentoring them to help and grow, and responsible for the data strategy of Marketplace along with the Data Science Lead, ensuring high quality of our data products.

If you want to help unveil new potential and move FREENOW in a much stronger position, here is your chance. In more detail this means‚Ä¶

YOUR DAILY ADVENTURES WILL INCLUDE:

  • Being hands-on and mentoring the MLEs to grow and improve the architecture, reliability and monitoring of our systems while being their line manager, as well as being the hiring manager for the role.
  • In close collaboration within the data science lead and engineering managers, set the right priorities for their teams, conceptualise and implement various components of the ML engineering infrastructure and processes to maximise the impact and value of data usage for all stakeholders in our increasingly complex market environment.
  • Facilitating effective collaboration between product managers, data scientists, machine learning engineers, data engineers and cross-functional engineering teams.
  • By using strategic thinking, business understanding and being informed on the latest developments in MLE, help the team to identify, understand, structure and solve complex problems and improve and productionize real-time data products.
  • Being the advocate for MLEs in the business and improving the speed and quality of delivery.

Our Datastack: Python | MLFlow | Databricks | Presto/Trino | Tableau | Airflow | Metabase & more

TO BE SUCCESSFUL IN THIS ROLE:

You are a problem solver, detail-oriented and self-motivated individual who thrives in an innovative, highly motivated environment, combining technical, product, business and leadership perspectives. Further key aspects of your profile are:

  • You like being a hands-on leader and being deep in the code but also know when to effectively delegate and help your direct reports grow in their careers
  • Excellent communication skills and capable of interacting and coordinating with internal and external stakeholders in steering end-to-end processes and projects
  • Experience leading and developing top performing data teams and collaboration with cross-functional engineering teams
  • Facilitating ways of working between Machine Learning engineers, Data Engineers and Data Scientists
  • A history of leading and supporting successful data projects and the ability to define project objectives, resources, timelines and methodologies clearly to all stakeholders
  • Strong analytical and problem solving skills
  • Ability to thrive in a fast paced and collaborative environment
  • Act as a role model in pragmatism to find solutions for your team

Title: AI Engineer (m/w/d)
Description:
Deine Aufgaben

Why we‚Äôre hiring for this role

Montamo is on a mission to revolutionize craftsmanship and solve the skilled labor shortage by building the most efficient installation process on the market. We‚Äôve mastered operations through smart processes and software, and our platform, "Lubo," is already transforming how heat pumps are installed and how tradespeople are trained.

But we‚Äôre just getting started. To take our operations, academy, and product to the next level, we need an Analytics Engineer who can build and own Montamo‚Äôs data stack from scratch. This role will be pivotal in enabling both in-product analytics for our groundbreaking guided installation platform and internal analytics to drive smarter business decisions across operations, talent development, and customer acquisition.

If you‚Äôre excited about shaping the data infrastructure of a fast-growing startup that‚Äôs redefining craftsmanship‚Äîand want to be part of the next big thing in clean energy solutions‚Äîthis is your chance.

What you'll do

You'll Own


Building Montamo's data foundation from scratch
Design and implement our data infrastructure including pipelines, warehouse, and governance
Create a unified data model that connects installation metrics, training outcomes, and customer journeys
In-product analytics for Lubo
Develop performance dashboards for technicians and operations teams
Identify user behavior patterns to improve our guided installation platform
Work with product to embed actionable insights directly into the technician experience
Internal analytics for business intelligence
Build leadership dashboards tracking KPIs across operations, academy, and customer acquisition
Transform raw operational data into insights that drive smarter decision-making
Enable data-driven optimization of technician scheduling and supply chain
Scale with pragmatism
Implement lightweight solutions that deliver immediate value while supporting future growth
Continuously evolve our data architecture as Montamo expands into new regions and services

Our developing tech stack & practices

While our AI/data stack is just getting started, you‚Äôll have the freedom to shape it using modern tools:


Data pipeline tools: Airflow or dbt (or your preferred choice!)
Data storage: Postgres (for now), Snowflake or BigQuery (as we scale)
Analytics tools: Looker Studio for dashboards; Python/R for deeper analysis
Event tracking: TBD‚Äîyou‚Äôll help us decide!


We love pragmatic approaches that focus on delivering value fast without compromising quality. You‚Äôll work closely with our software engineering team building Lubo on Next.js/Node.js/Postgres.

Dein Profil

You‚Äôre Our Match If You


Have 2-4 years of experience shipping AI systems and can navigate full-stack development
Get excited about:
Edge cases of deploying vision models on construction sites
Optimizing RAG pipelines for non-English speakers
Building ‚Äúgood enough now, scalable later‚Äù solutions
Can answer these cold: ‚ÄúHow would you compress a vision model for offline use on low-end Android devices?‚Äù ‚ÄúExplain fine-tuning vs. prompt engineering tradeoffs for multilingual support‚Äù ‚ÄúDebug a Next.js API route that‚Äôs timing out on GPU-heavy inference‚Äù
Bonus superpowers


Experience with voice interfaces or IoT sensor integration
German language skills to interact without intermediary your users
Passion for climate tech, craftmenship and/or upskilling workers


Our Engineering Lead Kristian has written a blog post on hiring and our values. Please read this before applying and joining the first interview to get an idea if you could be the match we're looking for.

Warum wir?

Build with Purpose

At Montamo, Your Work Directly Drives Clean Energy Adoption And Shapes The Future Of Craftsmanship. Here's Why Top Tech Talent Joins Us


Impact: Be part of a VC-backed rocketship scaling across Germany, with zero bureaucracy and direct influence on the product roadmap.
Growth: Collaborate with talented engineers in a flat structure with direct access to founders and leadership. Access dedicated time and resources to master technical skills, develop leadership abilities, and explore new technologies.
Flexibility: Creative and collaborative workspace in Berlin Mitte, with your choice of tools and software to best do your work (MacBook Pro, Thinkpad, Linux beast, Nebula GPU access).
Compensation: Transparent, market-competitive salaries and equity opportunities.


Join us to make a real-world impact while advancing your career in a dynamic, innovative environment!

For all roles at montamo, we use a data-backed compensation framework to keep salaries market-competitive, equitable, and simple to understand.

Ready to electrify craftsmanship?

Apply With


A 3-sentence pitch for an AI feature that would make technicians high-five their phone
Link to 1 AI project
Your favorite underrated AI paper and why we should care


√úber uns

montamo revolutioniert das Handwerk!

Unser Ziel ist es, der f√ºhrende Installationspartner f√ºr W√§rmepumpen, Solarsysteme und Wallboxen zu werden. Wir nutzen unsere eigene Technologie, um den effizientesten Installationsprozess auf dem Markt zu garantieren und gleichzeitig h√∂chste Qualit√§tsstandards beizubehalten. Wir bilden Quereinsteiger in unseren firmeneigenen Akademien aus, um einen wertvollen Beitrag zur L√∂sung des Fachkr√§ftemangel im Handwerk zu leisten. Wir sch√§tzen kulturelle Vielfalt und hei√üen Menschen aus der ganzen Welt willkommen.

Hilf uns, die Handwerksbranche von morgen zu gestalten, und bewirb dich noch heute!

Montamo ist ein Arbeitgeber der Chancengleichheit, d. h. wir diskriminieren nicht aufgrund von Ethnie, Hautfarbe, Religion, Familienstand, Alter, nationaler Herkunft, Abstammung, k√∂rperlicher oder geistiger Behinderung, Gesundheitszustand, Schwangerschaft, genetischer Information, Geschlecht, sexueller Orientierung, Geschlechtsidentit√§t oder -ausdruck. Title: Junior AI Solutions Engineer
Description:
Lovehoney Group is the world‚Äôs leading sexual wellbeing company, with the mission to elevate pleasure through innovative technologies, a data-driven approach, and foster creative and fresh perspectives on intimacy. We offer exciting brands with innovative, high-quality sex toys, lingerie, and accessories in a streamlined online shopping experience.

At Lovehoney, we employ over 800 passionate and progressive individuals across 9 global offices, each person contributing a unique blend of talents to our diverse workforce. We are proud to be a company that thrives by doing things differently, challenging expectations and stereotypes while making a positive impact on our customers‚Äô lives.

Join us at Lovehoney, where pleasure combines with creativity, data, and innovation!

We are currently looking for a Junior ML Scientist who will be integral to driving high-level performance across Lovehoney Group. Partnering directly with the Head of AI, your focus will be on developing AI Applications. In this role, you will combine your appreciation for Technology with your capacity for creative AI Solutions. You will develop skills crucial to advancing in a competitive, fast-paced retail sector, all within a company that prizes dedication and results.

What You Will Do


Craft Next-Level AI Solutions



Design, build, and optimise advanced LLM pipelines, emphasizing prompt engineering and chain-of-thought methodologies.

Actively research, prototype, and integrate new techniques to enhance LLM performance across real-world use cases.


Automate Business Processes



Develop automated workflows and AI agents using n8n.io (or similar platforms like Make), streamlining and optimizing key business processes.

Efficiently automate routine tasks, creating practical and reliable solutions that save time and resources.


AI Applications



Move swiftly from prototypes to tangible AI products, ensuring your work has immediate, measurable impact on business operations and customer experiences.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to manage AI project lifecycles from concept to deployment, demonstrating strong project management skills.

What You Should Bring


Python & ML Framework Proficiency



Excellent programming skills in Python.

Hands-on experience with popular machine learning frameworks, especially LangChain or LlamaIndex.


AI-Assisted Coding



Practical experience with AI-enhanced IDEs‚Äîparticularly Cursor.

A commitment to innovative coding practices (‚Äúvibe coding‚Äù) and continuous improvement of your development workflow.


Automation & Workflow Expertise ( n8n.io )



Hands-on experience building automation workflows using n8n.io (or Make/Copilot Studio).

Ability to enhance productivity and drive process improvements through well-designed automation solutions.


Database & API Skills



Solid experience working with standard databases (Redis, SQL/NoSQL).

Proficiency in retrieving, cleaning, transforming, and managing data via APIs for analytics and AI-driven applications.


Continuous Learner & Active Consumer of AI Content



You stay on top of the rapidly evolving AI landscape by actively consuming and engaging with content on platforms like X (Twitter), YouTube, and industry blogs.

Eagerness to translate new findings into actionable, real-world improvements.


Passion for AI‚Äôs Business Impact



A genuine excitement for the potential of AI to transform business processes.

Ability to quickly turn cutting-edge ideas into tangible, impactful solutions for internal operations and customer-facing products.

What We Can Offer You


A welcoming workplace full of drinks, snacks, friendly faces and fun team-building events
Access to unique discounts at high street retailers, hotels, and service providers, in addition to a 50% discount on all Lovehoney products to explore and discover new ways to have fun
Enjoy a hybrid work model that fosters flexibility and work-life balance, with three days per week in-office and the opportunity to work remotely for up to 4 weeks per year, alongside 25 days‚Äô holiday, plus an additional day for each year you are with Lovehoney, providing ample time for relaxation, rejuvenation, and exploration
Access to customised training opportunities to support your unique learning journey, complemented by biannual feedback cycles, offering valuable insights into your performance and growth areas, enhancing your development within the company.
Recognising the significance of physical and mental health, we proudly provide gym benefits in addition to a mental wellbeing platform, to ensure our employees thrive both professionally and personally.



Lovehoney Group is an equal opportunities employer. We promise that every qualified person will be evaluated according to skills regardless of age, disability, gender reassignment, marriage and civil partnership, pregnancy and maternity, race, religion or belief, sex, or sexual orientation.

If you require accommodations during the interview process due to a disability, please inform your Talent Acquisition Specialist so that we can ensure a smooth and inclusive experience for all candidates.

At Lovehoney Group, we leverage artificial intelligence as part of our screening interview process, for note-taking purposes. Rest assured, we prioritize transparency and respect candidates' preferences. You'll have the option to opt out while still receiving fair consideration for the role.

We currently have a hybrid work model supporting a blend of in-office and remote work (3 days per week in-office)

If we sparked your interest and you are open to embarking on your professional path with us, please visit our Lovehoney careers page to apply: https://jobs.eu.lever.co/lovehoneygroup

Our privacy policy is available here: https://www.lovehoneygroup.com/privacy-policy/

Title: Senior Data Scientist - AI Agents & Generative AI (f/m/d)*
Description:
Your Mission

As a Senior Data Scientist (f/m/d)*, you will evaluate and improve the performance of our AI Agents. This will involve developing evaluation tasks for agent behaviour, fine-tuning foundation models, researching and prototyping new AI Agent features and frameworks, and investigating issues affecting our customers. You‚Äôll develop a deep understanding of the behaviour of our models and AI Agents. You‚Äôll work directly with product engineering and sales teams, leading by example on evaluating and improving our product - from testing new AI system optimisation frameworks to fine-tuning STT models on new languages and accents.

You‚Äôll join the AI & Data Science Team, a collaborative group of Machine Learning Engineers and Data Scientists that own Parloa‚Äôs ML Evaluation Platform and the machine learning models that power our product. The team is responsible for keeping Parloa at the forefront of research and development of Generative AI and AI Agent based products.

In This Role You Will


Take ownership of data science and machine learning projects that help us improve our generative AI product suite
Develop and evaluate production Agentic AI systems for real customer use cases
Directly support and collaborate with product engineering and sales, analyzing the performance of our AI products and prototyping new features
Evaluate and train or fine-tune a variety of models, including LLMs, intent classification, STT, and TTS models
Execute Machine Learning research and development projects end-to-end, rapidly turning new ideas into customer facing features


Our Tech stack (AI & Data): Python, OpenAI, LangGraph, SQL, Microsoft Azure, Kubernetes, Terraform, Docker, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis, Eventhubs (Kafka), PostHog, Databricks, DeltaLiveTables, Preset

What You Bring To The Table


7+ years of experience as a Data Scientist
Experience developing and owning production ML models and systems. Experience with LLMs, NLP, or information retrieval is a strong plus
Strong proficiency in Python and experience with using using Python in production
Experience working with big data technologies (e.g. Spark) and using ML Ops platforms (e.g. MLFlow)
Experience with owning the ML process end-to-end: from gathering requirements to experimentation to productionisation, monitoring and optimization.
Experience in leading medium-sized technical projects (3-9 months roadmap)
Strong spoken and written communication skills in English


WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?


Be part of a dynamic, driven team of +40 nationalities with flat hierarchies and a collaborative company culture
Flexible office policy - we believe in hiring the best talent, no matter where they are based. However, we love to build real connections and want to welcome everyone in the office
Attractive compensation package
Training and development budget which can be used for conferences and attending development courses to ensure continuous professional growth
Flexible working hours, 28 vacation days and workation opportunities
Enjoy unlimited access to a variety of fitness, yoga, and leisure activities via Wellpass or Urban Sport Club.
We cover the cost of a monthly Deutschland train ticket.
Leverage exclusive offers with our corporate benefits portal, giving you access to compelling deals from leading brands.
Regular team events, game nights, and other social activities
And last but not least: a beautiful office with flair in the heart of Berlin with all the conveniences, such as adjustable desks, social area, fresh fruits, cereals and drinks
Is something missing here? Reach out and let's talk about what else you need for your ideal next growth opportunity


Your Recruiting Process At Parloa

Recruiter video call ‚Üí Hiring Manager Interview ‚Üí Technical Stage 1 (Data Science Coding Session) ‚Üí Technical Stage 2 (Machine Learning Theory & Case Study) ‚Üí Meeting the team

Why Parloa?

Parloa is one of the fastest growing startups in the world of Generative AI and customer service. Parloa‚Äôs voice-first GenAI platform for contact centers is built on the best AI technology to automate customer service with natural-sounding conversations for outstanding experiences on all communication channels. Leveraging natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning, Parloa creates intelligent phone and chat solutions for businesses that turn contact centers into value centers by boosting customer service efficiency. The Parloa platform resolves the majority of customer queries quickly and automatically, allowing human agents to focus on complex issues and relationships. Parloa was founded in 2018 by Malte Kosub and Stefan Ostwald and today employs over 250 people in Berlin, Munich, and New York.

When you join Parloa, you become part of a dynamic and innovative team made up of over 34 nationalities that‚Äôs revolutionizing an entire industry. We‚Äôre passionate about growing together and creating opportunities for personal and professional development. With our recent $66 million Series B investment, we‚Äôre expanding globally and looking for talented individuals to join us on this exciting journey.

Do you have questions about Parloa, the role, or our team before you apply? Please feel free to get in touch with our Hiring Team.

Parloa is committed to upholding the highest data protection standards for our clients' and employees' data. All our employees are instrumental in ensuring the utmost care, GDPR, and ISO compliance, including ISO 27001, in handling sensitive information.


We provide equal opportunities to all qualified applicants regardless race, gender, sexual orientation, age, religion, national origin, disability status, socioeconomic background and other characteristics.

This will involve developing evaluation tasks for agent behaviour, fine-tuning foundation models, researching and prototyping new AI Agent features and frameworks, and investigating issues affecting our customers. You‚Äôll develop a deep understanding of the behaviour of our models and AI Agents. You‚Äôll work directly with product engineering and sales teams, leading by example on evaluating and improving our product - from testing new AI system optimisation frameworks to fine-tuning STT models on new languages and accents.

You‚Äôll join the AI & Data Science Team, a collaborative group of Machine Learning Engineers and Data Scientists that own Parloa‚Äôs ML Evaluation Platform and the machine learning models that power our product. The team is responsible for keeping Parloa at the forefront of research and development of Generative AI and AI Agent based products.

In This Role You Will

  • Take ownership of data science and machine learning projects that help us improve our generative AI product suite
  • Develop and evaluate production Agentic AI systems for real customer use cases
  • Directly support and collaborate with product engineering and sales, analyzing the performance of our AI products and prototyping new features
  • Evaluate and train or fine-tune a variety of models, including LLMs, intent classification, STT, and TTS models
  • Execute Machine Learning research and development projects end-to-end, rapidly turning new ideas into customer facing features

Our Tech stack (AI & Data): Python, OpenAI, LangGraph, SQL, Microsoft Azure, Kubernetes, Terraform, Docker, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis, Eventhubs (Kafka), PostHog, Databricks, DeltaLiveTables, Preset

What You Bring To The Table

  • 7+ years of experience as a Data Scientist
  • Experience developing and owning production ML models and systems. Experience with LLMs, NLP, or information retrieval is a strong plus
  • Strong proficiency in Python and experience with using using Python in production
  • Experience working with big data technologies (e.g. Spark) and using ML Ops platforms (e.g. MLFlow)
  • Experience with owning the ML process end-to-end: from gathering requirements to experimentation to productionisation, monitoring and optimization.
  • Experience in leading medium-sized technical projects (3-9 months roadmap)
  • Strong spoken and written communication skills in English

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?

  • Be part of a dynamic, driven team of +40 nationalities with flat hierarchies and a collaborative company culture
  • Flexible office policy - we believe in hiring the best talent, no matter where they are based. However, we love to build real connections and want to welcome everyone in the office
  • Attractive compensation package
  • Training and development budget which can be used for conferences and attending development courses to ensure continuous professional growth
  • Flexible working hours, 28 vacation days and workation opportunities
  • Enjoy unlimited access to a variety of fitness, yoga, and leisure activities via Wellpass or Urban Sport Club.
  • We cover the cost of a monthly Deutschland train ticket.
  • Leverage exclusive offers with our corporate benefits portal, giving you access to compelling deals from leading brands.
  • Regular team events, game nights, and other social activities
  • And last but not least: a beautiful office with flair in the heart of Berlin with all the conveniences, such as adjustable desks, social area, fresh fruits, cereals and drinks
  • Is something missing here? Reach out and let's talk about what else you need for your ideal next growth opportunity

Your Recruiting Process At Parloa

Recruiter video call ‚Üí Hiring Manager Interview ‚Üí Technical Stage 1 (Data Science Coding Session) ‚Üí Technical Stage 2 (Machine Learning Theory & Case Study) ‚Üí Meeting the team

Why Parloa?

Parloa is one of the fastest growing startups in the world of Generative AI and customer service. Parloa‚Äôs voice-first GenAI platform for contact centers is built on the best AI technology to automate customer service with natural-sounding conversations for outstanding experiences on all communication channels. Leveraging natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning, Parloa creates intelligent phone and chat solutions for businesses that turn contact centers into value centers by boosting customer service efficiency. The Parloa platform resolves the majority of customer queries quickly and automatically, allowing human agents to focus on complex issues and relationships. Parloa was founded in 2018 by Malte Kosub and Stefan Ostwald and today employs over 250 people in Berlin, Munich, and New York.

When you join Parloa, you become part of a dynamic and innovative team made up of over 34 nationalities that‚Äôs revolutionizing an entire industry. We‚Äôre passionate about growing together and creating opportunities for personal and professional development. With our recent $66 million Series B investment, we‚Äôre expanding globally and looking for talented individuals to join us on this exciting journey.

Do you have questions about Parloa, the role, or our team before you apply? Please feel free to get in touch with our Hiring Team.

Parloa is committed to upholding the highest data protection standards for our clients' and employees' data. All our employees are instrumental in ensuring the utmost care, GDPR, and ISO compliance, including ISO 27001, in handling sensitive information.

  • We provide equal opportunities to all qualified applicants regardless race, gender, sexual orientation, age, religion, national origin, disability status, socioeconomic background and other characteristics.

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer (m/f/d)
Description:
What We Do

Merantix Momentum is a Berlin-based AI startup focusing on accelerating AI adoption across many industries through B2B solutions, as well as publicly funded research projects. We work across several domains, including manufacturing, healthcare, the German public sector, and many more, transforming businesses as an external machine learning department. We achieve this using our core expertise in state-of-the-art machine learning combined with our culture of rapid iterations to build scalable solutions.

Your role

Are you passionate about developing impactful applications of Machine Learning? The mission of this role is to bring state-of-the-art deep-learning methods to real-world applications from ideation and prototyping to production.

These Will Be Your Main Responsibilities


Leading major projects
Scope machine learning projects and their technical feasibility through client interaction
Contribute to the next generation AI stack and grow the open source ecosystem
Collaborate with data-, backend-, and frontend engineers in order to build production-ready AI solutions
Implement machine learning methods and apply them to real-world use cases


Your profile

The ideal candidate is proficient in software engineering and the latest machine- and deep-learning technologies, while also having a solid understanding of machine learning theory and fundamentals. You will independently scope, plan, manage, and drive machine learning projects from the ideation to the production phase - with a particular focus on Natural Language Processing.

You are a great fit for our team if this describes you:


MSc/PhD in computer science, machine learning, or related technical field
Relevant programming skills in Python and experience with libraries like PyTorch
Deep understanding of machine learning principles with hands-on experience training and fine-tuning neural networks
Appreciation for sound engineering practices like version control, clean code, code review, testing, CI/CD, and automation.
Ability to interact with clients, to understand their problems, and to design as well as to explain complex technical solutions
Fluency in English and German


What We Offer

Engaging Topics and Excellence: We offer unique insights into applied machine learning research and development, working with a group of highly talented engineers and entrepreneurs.


International Team: We are a dynamic and international team.
We offer Visa Sponsorship.
Learning and Development: We provide an annual learning and development budget for attending conferences or purchasing educational resources to further develop our employees‚Äô skills. We also hold weekly and monthly events around AI innovation and implementation.
Dynamic and open Working Culture: We have a very flat hierarchy, open 360¬∞ feedback, and flexibility in our work-from-home policy as well as working hours.
AI Ethics: We are committed to developing ethical AI software and actively foster open discussions on this topic within our team.
Brand new office space: Bright and open office situated on the AI Campus in Berlin.
Hardware allowance: We give you support to have all the equipment you would need to thrive on your job.
Sabbatical Leave;
Employee benefits: We offer a monthly allowance per employee that can be allocated as desired to one of the following: Mobility & transportation (NAVIT), sports (Urban Sports Club) or groceries (Edenred).


About Us

We are an equal-opportunity employer and value diversity. We consider all applications equally regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, or gender identity. We strongly encourage individuals from groups traditionally underrepresented in tech to apply, and we can help with immigration.

Title: Data Scientist - Consumer (Global Discovery)
Description:
About The Opportunity

We are on the lookout for a Data Scientist to join the Search & Ranking team within consumer discovery on our journey to always deliver amazing experiences.


Develop and Optimize Search Algorithms: Enhance and research new search machine learning algorithms, such as learning to rank, semantic search, and personalization, to deliver the most relevant results to our users.
Collaborate Across Teams: Work as part of a cross-functional team, including Backend Engineers, Product Managers, and Data Engineers, to improve our global search end-2-end.
Analyze and interpret large datasets: Extract meaningful insights to understand relevance problems.
Innovate and Experiment: Identify and apply the best machine learning and statistical methods to solve complex problems, ensuring solutions are scalable and effective in production environments.
Navigate Ambiguity: Define and tackle data science problems amidst ambiguity, ensuring clear problem definitions and actionable insights


At Delivery Hero, you‚Äôll shape the global consumer experience for millions of users. Your work will have a direct impact on how we attract and retain customers, creating data-driven, personalized interactions that keep them coming back. As part of our Consumer Team, you‚Äôll enhance customer satisfaction and drive global growth and profitability through innovative projects.

What you need to be successful


Experience: Master‚Äôs degree (or Bachelor‚Äôs with 4+ years of work experience) in a quantitative field such as Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Theoretical Chemistry, or similar. 2+ years of experience as a data scientist working on applying data science fundamentals to solve complex business problems
Technical Expertise: Proficiency in SQL and Python and its ML ecosystem is essential. Experience with Java and Scala is a plus.
Machine Learning Knowledge: Strong understanding of a wide variety of ML and statistical methods, including Classical ML, Deep Learning, NLP, and Recommendation Systems. Ability to discern the most suitable approach for different problems.
Search and Ranking ML Algorithms: Hands-on experience with search machine learning algorithms, such as learning to rank, semantic search, and personalization.
Problem-Solving: Comfortable with ambiguity and capable of navigating it to define clear data science problems and solutions. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a focus on delivering practical solutions.
Collaborative Spirit: Proven experience working in cross-functional teams, contributing effectively to joint projects and achieving common goals. Excellent communication skills to articulate complex ideas and influence stakeholders.


Who we are

As the world‚Äôs pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe‚Äôs largest tech platforms, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.

What's in it for you

Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you‚Äôre in good shape, then we‚Äôre in good shape.


Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
We will support you in developing yourself and your career growth opportunities: 1.000 ‚Ç¨ Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support and access to the Udemy Business platform to explore a variety of online courses.
Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we‚Äôll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts. Courses.


Ready to join our team? If you‚Äôre excited to grow, collaborate and be part of the world‚Äôs leading delivery platform, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Apply today!

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience‚Äîjust include it in your application. You're welcome to share your pronouns (he/she/they) right from the start so we can address you respectfully from our first contact.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Are you an experienced Data Scientist, and you love what you do? Would you like to be a part of a global customer facing Team focussed on solving complex, real-world business problems? Would you like to be a part of a worldclass community of technical leaders, highly specialised in their disciplines and working together as one to bring the best practices of Artificial Intelligence, Machine learning, Engineering and Architecture to world‚Äôs largest enterprise customers?

The Industry Solutions Delivery (ISD) Engineering & Architecture Group (EAG) is a global engineering consulting organisation that supports our‚ÄØmost complex and leading-edge‚ÄØcustomer engagements in improving their business performance with the power of Data & AI.‚ÄØ EAG develops approaches, innovative‚ÄØsolutions, and engineering‚ÄØstandards to set our delivery teams and customers up for long-lasting‚ÄØsuccess.‚ÄØWe are committed to Responsible AI, and we help our customers build and operate ethical, transparent and trustworthy AI solutions.

We are hiring a‚ÄØSenior Data Scientist‚ÄØwith deep experience in advanced statistical data analysis, machine learning and artificial intelligence.

Our team embraces a continuous learning and growth mindset, encourages diverse viewpoints and relentless collaboration. We value personal and cultural experiences and strive for excellence. We offer a flexible work environment to help you succeed in creating transformative and responsible AI solutions that positively impact economy and people worldwide.

Microsoft‚Äôs mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.

Responsibilities




Leverage data science, AI and business domain knowledge to improve business performance, evaluate project plans, communicate business goals, and share insights with stakeholders.
Acquire, prepare, and explore data through querying, visualisation, reporting techniques, and collaboration with other teams, ensuring data integrity.
Apply machine learning, generative AI and statistical analysis to develop models, train, optimise, and evaluate them, and communicate findings to stakeholders.
Test, review, and improve models by analysing performance, incorporating feedback, and contributing to the review process.
Write and debug efficient and scalable code while collaborating with engineering teams and integrate data models into customer systems and production.
Collaborate with customers and Microsoft teams to define business needs, create roadmaps for performance improvements, and influence stakeholders using storytelling and visual tools to drive solution value.


Other

Embody our culture and values

Qualifications


Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Econometrics, Economics, Operations Research, Computer Science, or related field AND business-focused data science experience (e.g., managing structured and unstructured data, applying statistical techniques and reporting results).
Experience leading complex projects, designing scalable solutions, and applying advanced techniques to solve business challenges. Strong coding, problem-solving, and communication skills.
Deep hands-on software engineering experience (e.g. Python, Scikit, PyTorch etc) with main established data science and generative AI frameworks.
Familiarity with building and deploying largescale AI solutions into production within a cloud environment.


Preferred


Fluency in German.


Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

Title: Senior Data Scientist (SOC / Carbon Modelling) (m/f/d)
Description:
At Klim, we‚Äôre creating a joint movement with farmers and businesses to make regenerative agriculture scalable and impactful. As a Berlin-based AgriTech start-up, we‚Äôre empowering farmers to restore soil, boost biodiversity, and capture carbon‚Äîall while earning revenue through our platform.

Backed by $22 million in Series A funding, we‚Äôre expanding globally, partnering with major food industry leaders like Nestl√© and Kaufland to help them reduce emissions along their supply chains, while making them more resilient and profitable at the same time. Since 2020, we‚Äôve supported 3,500 farmers, covering 700,000 hectares (5% of Germany‚Äôs farmland!).

If you‚Äôre passionate about building a sustainable food system and driving real climate impact, join us and help create a healthier planet!

At Klim, we are revolutionizing agriculture by empowering farmers to adopt regenerative practices and contribute to a sustainable future. A critical component of our mission is developing accurate and robust SOC/carbon models, which drive the creation of our advanced data products to support farmers in their transition to regenerative agriculture.

To further strengthen our modeling capabilities, we are seeking a Senior Data Scientist to join our team.

As Senior Data Scientist you will:


Proactively assess and identify opportunities for data science applications, data products, and automations.
Build robust, scalable data models to support ML systems and improve data accessibility
Analyse and enhance our internal sequestration and environmental models to ensure robustness, accuracy, and scalability.
Support in the decision-making process on how to meaningfully enhance our carbon model by means of using different soil science models (e.g. Bodium) and improving our existing models.
Collaborate cross-functionally with agronomists, engineers, and product teams.
Stay informed on the latest trends and advancements in data science, environmental modeling, and related fields.


Your profile:


Advanced degree (MSc or PhD) in Data Science, Environmental Science, Agronomy, Computer Science, or a related field.
Proficiency in Python and SQL with experience using ML frameworks and libraries such as PyTorch and scikit-learn in a production/product environment.
Experience collaborating with engineering and product teams, with proficiency in version controlling (e.g., Git).
Ability to translate business requirements into quantitative solutions and clearly communicate insights to non-technical stakeholders.
Ability to manage multiple projects in a fast-paced environment.
Experience working with large-scale geospatial and sensor data and familiarity with remote sensing are a plus.
Proven experience in developing environmental models, with a focus on SOC/sequestration modelling or similar domains. Familiarity with RothC is a plus.
Full working proficiency in English. German is a plus.


Benefits:


Opportunity: Be part of our journey from the very beginning, working on an equal footing with the leadership team to build a new company
Impact: Make a daily and active contribution to combating climate change, promoting consumer education, and fostering fair conditions for our climate-conscious farmers
Autonomy: Take ownership of your projects and enjoy a high degree of creative freedom
Competitive package: Receive a competitive salary and have the opportunity to participate in our VSIP program
Flexible work model: At Klim, we foster a flexible, hybrid work approach and facilitate hybrid/remote work (within Germany). It is advantageous for this role if you live in Berlin or can be present in our office regularly.
Additional benefits: We offer membership in the Urban Sports Club or the Deutschlandticket, team lunches (if in Berlin) and regular team events.


At Klim, we believe that a thriving workplace is built on the diverse backgrounds, talents, and perspectives of our team. We grow stronger together by embracing and building on each individual‚Äôs unique strengths.

We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment where everyone feels valued and empowered to contribute their best. All hiring and personnel decisions are made solely based on qualifications, performance, and the needs of the company‚Äîensuring fairness and equal opportunity for all.

If you‚Äôre excited about this role but don‚Äôt meet every requirement, we still encourage you to apply. You might be the perfect fit for our team in ways you don‚Äôt yet realise!


Show more
HTML:
At Klim, we‚Äôre creating a joint movement with farmers and businesses to make regenerative agriculture scalable and impactful. As a Berlin-based AgriTech start-up, we‚Äôre empowering farmers to restore soil, boost biodiversity, and capture carbon‚Äîall while earning revenue through our platform.

Backed by $22 million in Series A funding, we‚Äôre expanding globally, partnering with major food industry leaders like Nestl√© and Kaufland to help them reduce emissions along their supply chains, while making them more resilient and profitable at the same time. Since 2020, we‚Äôve supported 3,500 farmers, covering 700,000 hectares (5% of Germany‚Äôs farmland!).

If you‚Äôre passionate about building a sustainable food system and driving real climate impact, join us and help create a healthier planet!

At Klim, we are revolutionizing agriculture by empowering farmers to adopt regenerative practices and contribute to a sustainable future. A critical component of our mission is developing accurate and robust SOC/carbon models, which drive the creation of our advanced data products to support farmers in their transition to regenerative agriculture.

To further strengthen our modeling capabilities, we are seeking a Senior Data Scientist to join our team.

As Senior Data Scientist you will:

  • Proactively assess and identify opportunities for data science applications, data products, and automations.
  • Build robust, scalable data models to support ML systems and improve data accessibility
  • Analyse and enhance our internal sequestration and environmental models to ensure robustness, accuracy, and scalability.
  • Support in the decision-making process on how to meaningfully enhance our carbon model by means of using different soil science models (e.g. Bodium) and improving our existing models.
  • Collaborate cross-functionally with agronomists, engineers, and product teams.
  • Stay informed on the latest trends and advancements in data science, environmental modeling, and related fields.

Your profile:

  • Advanced degree (MSc or PhD) in Data Science, Environmental Science, Agronomy, Computer Science, or a related field.
  • Proficiency in Python and SQL with experience using ML frameworks and libraries such as PyTorch and scikit-learn in a production/product environment.
  • Experience collaborating with engineering and product teams, with proficiency in version controlling (e.g., Git).
  • Ability to translate business requirements into quantitative solutions and clearly communicate insights to non-technical stakeholders.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects in a fast-paced environment.
  • Experience working with large-scale geospatial and sensor data and familiarity with remote sensing are a plus.
  • Proven experience in developing environmental models, with a focus on SOC/sequestration modelling or similar domains. Familiarity with RothC is a plus.
  • Full working proficiency in English. German is a plus.

Benefits:

  • Opportunity: Be part of our journey from the very beginning, working on an equal footing with the leadership team to build a new company
  • Impact: Make a daily and active contribution to combating climate change, promoting consumer education, and fostering fair conditions for our climate-conscious farmers
  • Autonomy: Take ownership of your projects and enjoy a high degree of creative freedom
  • Competitive package: Receive a competitive salary and have the opportunity to participate in our VSIP program
  • Flexible work model: At Klim, we foster a flexible, hybrid work approach and facilitate hybrid/remote work (within Germany). It is advantageous for this role if you live in Berlin or can be present in our office regularly.
  • Additional benefits: We offer membership in the Urban Sports Club or the Deutschlandticket, team lunches (if in Berlin) and regular team events.

At Klim, we believe that a thriving workplace is built on the diverse backgrounds, talents, and perspectives of our team. We grow stronger together by embracing and building on each individual‚Äôs unique strengths.

We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment where everyone feels valued and empowered to contribute their best. All hiring and personnel decisions are made solely based on qualifications, performance, and the needs of the company‚Äîensuring fairness and equal opportunity for all.

If you‚Äôre excited about this role but don‚Äôt meet every requirement, we still encourage you to apply. You might be the perfect fit for our team in ways you don‚Äôt yet realise!

Title: (Senior) Data Scientist (m/f/d)
Description:
We are looking for a

(Senior) Data Scientist (m/f/d)

(full-time) at our location in Oslo, Berlin, Verl, Stockholm or Amsterdam (flexible working conditions available)

The Data Science (Consumer and Risk) team at Riverty is looking for skilled professionals to build Risk and Fraud machine learning models for our online payment products. Our primary goal is to determine whom to accept and whom to decline based on data from past customers. This involves both detecting fraudulent transactions and identifying trustworthy ones by analyzing payment histories of similar customers.

Your Responsibilities:


Participate in the entire modeling process, from data cleaning and feature engineering to model training and evaluation.
Anticipate potential issues in the model-building process and suggest strategies to mitigate pitfalls.
Engage in coding and code reviews to ensure quality and efficiency.
Collaborate within a cross-functional team to drive innovation and effectiveness.



What You Bring:


Experience working with transactional databases or case handling systems.
A bachelor's, master's, or Ph.D. in a STEM field (e.g. Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Engineering, or related disciplines).
Ability to work with imperfect data‚Äîdata collected for purposes other than machine learning.
Hands-on experience deploying models into production.
Proficiency in Python for data science applications.
Familiarity with common data science frameworks in Python.
A strong interest in learning new tools and technologies.



Bonus Skills:


Experience writing production-ready Python code.
Knowledge of SQL, relational databases, Spark, Databricks, VS Code, and Docker.
Previous experience in the risk and fraud domain.



Our Hiring Process:

We aim to make our hiring process smooth and transparent:


Pre-screening Call with HR: A brief conversation to understand your background and motivation.
Live Coding Challenge: A short technical task to evaluate your coding skills.
Interview with the Hiring Manager: A discussion about your experience, problem-solving approach, and team fit.
Bar Raiser Interview with the Department Lead: A final conversation to assess cultural and strategic alignment.



#EUR5

Benefits:


At Riverty, you can be who you are. We are committed to creating an inclusive environment and a culture of appreciation, enriched by our employee networks.
Prioritize your health with supported sports and leisure activities.
Take advantage of our numerous training and development opportunities! Enhance your skills with training offered by the Bertelsmann University, language courses, or leadership training.
Benefit from our discounts on Bertelsmann products and financial incentives.
With our diverse work models, you can tailor your work to your preferences. Take advantage of mobile office, flexible working hours, and part-time models.

Title: AI Engineer (m/f/d) in B2B SaaS AI Startup
Description:
We are traide AI ü§ñ, a groundbreaking deep tech, VC-backed, B2B startup powered by AI ( we did AI long before the hype üòâüòÅ) .




Our breakthrough in revenue, with an increase of over 10x in the past year, positions us at the brink of a significant expansion phaseüî•. By developing the definitive "global trade compliance intelligence platform", building up around our customs classification engine, fully powered by (artifical-) Intelligence, we‚Äôre already transforming the landscape of international trade.




Our product, team, and vision have convinced already prestigious partners like PwC, and our customer base includes industry juggernauts such as Siemens, every day industry Heros like W√ºrth, alongside other notable figures in industry. We are rapidly solidifying our leadership position within the EU while eyeing global expansion üèÜ.




AI is deeply embedded in the DNA of our company, reflected in the extensive AI expertise of our founders, the culture within our company and team, and our proven track record of developing and commercializing AI while delivering real business value with AI-centered features ü§ñ üß¨ . This role aims to strengthen our AI DNA, enabling us to further execute our vision and missionüöÄ .




If you are an exceptional individual and feel that you would be a great fit for our compact yet highly skilled team, let us know about you. We would be delighted to hear from you ü§ùüí° !


Tasks


As an AI Engineer, you‚Äôll collaborate closely with our product and tech team to develop innovative features that address customer needs and drive business impact. In this role, you'll engage in:





Research & Experimentation: Research and delve into cutting-edge AI techniques, prototype novel ideas, and rigorously validate concepts through experiments and metrics.


End-to-End Development: Transform research insights into production-ready features through careful planning, prototype development, quality assurance, and seamless integration of AI functionalities.


Problem Solving & Innovation: With a curious and analytical mindset, you‚Äôll ask the deeper ‚Äúwhy‚Äù questions to uncover root problems, explore creative solutions, and bring them to life.


Take a product-focused approach and care about building solutions that are robust, scalable, and easy to use.





While you‚Äôll take on significant responsibility, you‚Äôre never alone. You can rely on a supportive team where knowledge-sharing and mutual growth are core values.


Requirements



Minimum of 5 years of professional experience in: Data-Sience, Machine learning, Deeplearning and/or Generative AI & AI-Agents. With a proven track record of developing and deploying AI-driven solutions in production environments.


Strong Software-Engineering OR Data-Science background. Have a Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or comparable experience.


Strong analytical, logical reasoning, skills with a creative approach to problem-solving.


Willingness to learn new technologies and adapt to changing requirements.


Communication skills, collaborative attitude and ability to work effectively within a diverse team.





Experience with some of these technologies:
- Programming Language: Python (required); Deeplearning Frameworks: pytorch, tensorflow, Other: ML-Ops


Benefits


So, why choose traide AI?




On the product side





Meetings and processes kept to a minimum and focus on getting things done (Kanban Style).


We value clean and well-tested code and ship features only once they are up to standard


Modern tech stack with the opportunity to shape future decisions: React + Chakra-UI, Node.js + GraphQL, Python + Pytorch, LLM/Generative AI and more





In the organization




‚úîÔ∏è traide AI is a place where you can be your authentic self!




‚úîÔ∏è We are creators, not rule followers. In our open culture, ideas take precedence over hierarchies, truth finding is essential üôå




‚úîÔ∏è Our work culture is flexible and grounded entirely in trust and integrity, where everyone strives to grow & learn




‚úîÔ∏è And the cherry on top? Our offices are the coolest around ‚Äì our cozy Berlin office is conveniently located at Rosenthaler Platz and offers fantastic lunch spots.




We look forward to receiving your application and getting to know you better üöÄ




If you have any questions, just email us.

Title: Research Sciences Intern (VISION)
Description:
Come build community, explore your passions and do your best work at Microsoft with thousands of University interns from every corner of the world. This opportunity will allow you to bring your aspirations, talent, potential‚Äîand excitement for the journey ahead.

The Applied Sciences Group (ASG) is seeking a highly motivated and talented PhD student to join our team as a Research Intern. This internship offers a unique opportunity to work on cutting-edge research in the fields of Large Language Models (LLMs), Vision-Language Models (VLMs), and Generative Image & Video. The successful candidate will collaborate with a team of experienced researchers and engineers to tackle real-world challenges and contribute to the advancement of AI technologies.

Responsibilities


Conduct research in one or more of the following areas: LLMs, VLMs, and Generative Image & Video.
Design and implement experiments to test new hypotheses and validate research findings.
Develop and optimise algorithms and models for various AI applications.
Collaborate with team members to integrate research outcomes into practical solutions.
Present research findings to the team and contribute to publications and patents.


Qualifications

Required: Qualifications:


Currently pursuing a PhD in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or a related field.
Strong background in LLMs, VLMs, or Generative Image & Video.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python.
Experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Strong communication skills and the ability to present complex ideas clearly.


Preferred Qualifications


Strong track record of success, evidenced by publications in prestigious computer vision and machine learning conferences, including NeurIPS, ECCV, ICCV, CVPR.
Proven software engineering capabilities, evidenced by professional experience, internships, impactful open-source contributions, and success in coding competitions.


Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

Title: Senior Data Scientist (Logistics, Service)
Description:
About The Opportunity

We are on the lookout for a Senior Data Scientist (NLP) - Logistics, Service (all genders) to join our team to help us create outstanding customer service products using NLP, machine learning and generative AI.

You will join the Service Data Science squad on our mission to automate and optimize interactions with customers, making sure they have a high quality experience which scales as our business grows. We pride ourselves on our ability to connect research and theory to practical problems, and to bring our solutions to production systems. The squad is supported by an amazing team of ML Engineers who build reusable tooling, so our Data Scientists are able to focus on solving the modelling challenges. We also integrate closely with product teams so that we keep connected to the needs of the organization.

If you are a creative problem solver who is hungry for a new adventure, a diverse, international and inclusive workplace is waiting for you in the heart of Berlin!

Your mission:


Conceptualize the right modelling approach for challenges in the field of Customer Service at scale, together with your squad lead and our stakeholders, using cutting-edge research to inform your decisions
Build solutions end-to-end from inception to production-grade systems - including research & prototyping, gathering data requirements, cross-team alignment, product development, experimentation, deployment and monitoring.
Contribute and make an impact in a global, fast-moving tech organization.
Have fun and grow together with your team.


What you need to be successful


You have 5+ years of experience working as a Data Scientist in industry, or in equivalent academic roles
You have experience applying machine learning or statistical methods to real-world datasets and a proven track record of delivering data science solutions to production systems.
You are familiar with classical NLP and NLU problems, such as text classification, summarisation, translation, NER and speech-to-text.
You are familiar with libraries such as HF Transformers, SpaCY, pytorch or JAX, as well as gen-ai tooling such as llama.cpp, langchain or similar. You also understand typical Generative AI model architectures such as transformers, VAE or GANs, frameworks such as Retrieval Augmented Generation, and are familiar with finetuning methods such as LORA.
You are fluent in Python, and familiar with a range of scientific and statistical libraries. Other languages are a bonus!
You have a strong working knowledge of AB testing, and experience of designing and analysing experiments to inform the development of products
You have experience with a range of software engineering tools including Git, Docker, cloud technologies (GCP/AWS), Kubernetes, CI/CD, and pipeline tools such as Metaflow.
You write maintainable code that follows best practices in software engineering.
You are fluent in English.


Who we are

As the world‚Äôs pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe‚Äôs largest tech platforms, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.

What's in it for you


Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you‚Äôre in good shape, then we‚Äôre in good shape.
Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
We will support you in developing yourself and your career growth opportunities: 1.000 ‚Ç¨ Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support and access to the Udemy Business platform to explore a variety of online courses.
Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we‚Äôll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts. Courses.
Ready to join our team? If you‚Äôre excited to grow, collaborate and be part of the world‚Äôs leading delivery platform, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Apply today!


At Delivery Hero, we believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring -- therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. Just be yourself and we can‚Äôt wait to see what value you bring to the role. We're as interested in your character as we are in your talent.

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience‚Äîjust include it in your application. You're welcome to share your pronouns (he/she/they) right from the start so we can address you respectfully from our first contact.

Title: SoftwareArchitekt
Description:
SoftwareArchitekt bei Inno-focus digital gmbh

Anforderungen

Wohnsitz: Nur f√ºr Bewerber aus Deutschland, √ñsterreich und der Schweiz

Sprache: Deutsch - Muttersprachliches Niveau

Du hast Dein Studium der Informatik mit einem Master abgeschlossen.

Seit mindestens sechs Jahren arbeitest Du als Softwarearchitekt und Lead-Softwareentwickler an komplexen Systemen, zum Beispiel an einem ERP-System. In dieser Zeit hast Du Dir fundierte Kenntnisse in der Datenmodellierung, der Abbildung von Business-Logik und in der Entwicklung von Code-Generatoren angeeignet.

Du verf√ºgst √ºber mehrj√§hrige Erfahrung in der Programmierung im .NET-Umfeld (C#, C++), setzt Angular gezielt ein und arbeitest routiniert in agilen Entwicklungsteams.

Du kannst sowohl externe als auch interne Entwickler sicher anleiten.

Du arbeitest Dich schnell in komplexe Sachverhalte ein und hast Freude daran, Modelle zu entwickeln, die sich in Software umsetzen lassen.

Deine didaktischen F√§higkeiten sind stark ausgepr√§gt und Du kannst Dich gut auf das jeweilige Know-how Deiner Kolleginnen und Kollegen einstellen.

T√§tigkeiten

Du √ºbernimmst die Rolle Software Architekt und Lead-Software-Entwickler f√ºr ein komplexes Handels- und Logistik System. Das System deckt alle Gesch√§ftsvorf√§lle f√ºr den station√§ren Handel und den Online-Handel ab. Dies umfasst sowohl Sachg√ºter als auch Dienstleistungen und deren Kombinationen. Das System ist als Multi-Channel-System in den Lieferketten und im Absatz an verschiedene digitale Plattformen eingebunden. Das Business ist B2C und B2B.

Team

Du wirst in einem Entwicklungsteam arbeiten, in dem Deine Kollegen, externe Entwickler und die Mitarbeiter des Kunden vertreten sind. Wir organisieren unsere Aufgabenstellungen √ºber agile Methoden komplett agil, so dass Du Deinen Arbeitsort frei w√§hlen kannst. Neben den digitalen Meeting Formaten treffen wir uns auch im Rahmen von Veranstaltungen f√ºr die Fort- und Weiterbildungen pers√∂nlich in Berlin oder an einer coolen "Location".

√úber das Unternehmen

Seit 20 Jahren ber√§t und unterst√ºtzt inno-focus f√ºhrende Unternehmen, Regierungsorganisationen, Vereine und Cluster bei der Entwicklung von Innovationsstrategien, der Implementierung von Innovationsmanagement sowie bei der Umsetzung von Innovationsprojekten.

F√ºr die Entwicklung erfolgreicher Innovationsstrategien bedarf es verst√§rkt eines dynamischen Zusammenspiels unterschiedlichster Akteure. Daher liegt ein weiterer Schwerpunkt der inno-focus darauf, Innovationsnetzwerke zu etablieren. √úber diese Arbeit hat sich inno-focus in den vergangenen Jahren zu einem international anerkannten Spezialisten f√ºr Open und Cross Innovation sowie Crowdsourcing entwickelt.

Beispielsweise wurde 2004 das Innovationsnetzwerk ‚ÄûInnovation Excellence Netzwerk‚Äú gegr√ºndet, welches neben einer Vielzahl namhafter Unternehmen auch Vertreter aus Wissenschaft, Forschung und Politik umfasst.Seit 2010 ber√§t Cluster bei der der Strategieentwicklung sowie dem operativen Cluster-Management. F√ºr das Management der Innovation-√ñkosystem von Clustern hat inno-focus die Innovation Plattform innoecos entwickelt. innoecos liefert Clustern und Unternehmen eine Plattform, um Innovationsnetzwerke aufzubauen und zu managen.

Klicke auf "Bewerben" f√ºr Details zu den Benefits, dem Team und dem Bewerbungsprozess.

Title: Data Science Manager
Description:
Interested in leading data-driven innovation while working in a collaborative, high-impact environment? Passionate about machine learning, big data, and predictive modeling?




We‚Äôve partnered with a fast-growing tech company that is looking for a highly experienced Data Scientist to drive data strategy, machine learning implementation, and data product development across the org. This role offers the opportunity to work on large-scale data solutions, mentor a growing team, and establish best practices in data science and analytics.




What You‚Äôll Be Working On:

Driving data science and analytics strategy, fostering collaboration and best practices across the Data chapter
Improving existing data analysis and reporting structures
Designing and optimizing data pipelines with tools like Apache Airflow, DAGster, and DBT
Working with large datasets to enhance product performance and decision-making
Establishing best practices for cost-effective, scalable data solutions
Mentoring and guiding data analysts and scientists within the organization




Ideal Experience:

Proven industry experience in big data, data warehousing, and data products
Relevant background in LLMs, NLP, and predictive modeling (preferred)
Hands-on experience with SQL, Python, Spark, DuckDB, Snowflake, and Metabase
Expertise in building scalable data pipelines and working with large datasets
Knowledge of servant leadership principles in autonomous product team environments




Other Important Details:

Hybrid role based in Berlin
Competitive salary and benefits package
30 vacation days & remote work flexibility
Company pension, wellness programs, and professional development opportunities




This is an opportunity to lead and shape the future of data science within a forward-thinking company. If you're interested or want to know more, click Apply or reach out to Ionut Roghina for more details.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer AI Automation (LLMs)
Description:
Founded in 2008, BMG reimagined the relationship between music companies, songwriters, and artists by offering fairer contracts, greater creative freedom, and unparalleled transparency in royalties and licensing. Now the fourth-largest music company in the world, BMG combines human creativity with cutting-edge technology to connect music with global audiences.




We are looking for a ML-Engineer (f/m/d) to join our team and play a key role in developing AI-driven automation solutions that enhance efficiency and deliver high-performance results. As part of a dynamic and dedicated team of software and ML engineers, you will be responsible for designing, coding, and optimizing AI cloud-based services leveraging neural networks and LLMs into automation processes as well as taking part of the growing development of AI in BMG and the music industry.




If you're passionate about AI, LLMs, cloud-based services, and automation, and you want to contribute to the development of game-changing solutions, we would love to hear from you!




What you‚Äôll be doing

Design and develop scalable AI-driven automation solutions, ensuring they meet both current and future business needs
Collaborate closely with product managers, engineers, and data science teams to integrate AI models seamlessly into automation workflows
Ensure the creation of high-performance, robust, and maintainable software, adhering to best practices for software engineering and AI system design
Troubleshoot and optimize AI-powered automation systems, improving efficiency, accuracy, and reliability
Conduct thorough testing and validation of AI models and automation solutions to ensure they meet quality standards and perform consistently under various conditions
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI, LLMs and automation technologies, integrating cutting-edge solutions to enhance system capabilities and drive innovation
Implement and challenge state-of-the-art neural networks and transformers through various research and development projects to rigorously evaluate their performance and deploy impactful AI solutions that transform the music industry




What you bring

5+ years of experience in ML, software engineering, or automation, with a proven ability to develop and deploy AI-driven solutions
Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field, with a solid foundation in software development, AI technologies and ML
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Java, or other relevant languages commonly used in AI and automation development
Hands-on experience with APIs implementation and integrating ML models into production environments
Hands-on experience with ML models (DNN, DT, Transformers, LLMs) implementation, training/fine-tuning and evaluation in an R&D context
Scientific publications and experience conducting scientific research is a plus
Strong problem-solving abilities and a demonstrated capacity to collaborate effectively in agile teams, adapting to changing requirements and priorities¬¥
Experience with cloud platforms and deployment (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) is a plus, enabling efficient scaling of AI solutions
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to clearly articulate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders




What we offer

A modern office in the heart of Berlin and flexible options for remote work
Numerous benefits such as a free BVG job ticket, a reduced-price membership for Urban Sports, company bike leasing, discounts for Bertelsmann employees, among others
Ongoing training opportunities on our internal platforms BMG Campus and Bertelsmann University
Long-term career opportunities for all employees
A collaborative work environment with an open, appreciative community of people who all share the same passion for working with artists and songwriters
Our unique corporate culture based on strong values and mutual support that make us a great team




This is us

With 20 offices across 13 key markets, BMG represents more than three million songs and recordings, including some of the most iconic catalogs and works from leading artists and songwriters such as The Rolling Stones, Tina Turner, George Harrison, Blondie, and more. BMG is wholly owned and privately held by the international media, services, and education company Bertelsmann, whose other content businesses include the entertainment company RTL Group and the trade book publisher Penguin Random House.




As the great Kurt Cobain* once said, ‚ÄúCome as you are.‚Äù BMG is committed to providing equal employment opportunities and we celebrate diversity in all forms. Equal opportunity runs deep in our core value of fairness and we are determined to create a truly inclusive work environment, where everyone can flourish. If you‚Äôre good at what you do, come as you are.







All applicants to BMG will receive equal treatment regardless of age, disability, gender identity or expression, marital or civil parter status, pregnancy or maternity, race, color, nationality, ethnic or national origin, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation.

(BMG is the proud representative of Kurt Cobain‚Äôs publishing catalogue, including the 1992 single ‚ÄòCome As You Are‚Äô)
